0.title: Log records received
0.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

1.title: Metric records received
1.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

2.title: Log records refused
2.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_refused_log_records), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

3.title: Metric records refused
3.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_refused_metric_points), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

6.title: Trace spans refused
6.query:

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

8.title: Log records accepted by processor
8.query:

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

9.query:

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)

11.title: Log records dropped by processor
11.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_processor_dropped_log_records), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

12.title: Metric points dropped by processor
12.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_processor_dropped_metric_points), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

13.query:

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)

14.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_processor_batch_batch_size_trigger_send), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

15.query:

| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

17.title: Log records sent by exporter
17.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_log_records), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

18.title: Metric point sent by exporter
18.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_metric_points), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

19.title: Spans  sent by exporter
19.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

21.title: Collector instance availability (approx)
21.query:
timeseries uptime = sum(otelcol_process_uptime), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector,service_instance_id}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| parse service_instance_id, "LD '-' LD '-' LD '-' LD '-' LD:instance"
| fieldsAdd uptime = toDuration(uptime[])
| fieldsAdd ratio = uptime[]/interval*100000000000
| summarize avail = avg(arrayAvg(ratio)), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector,instance}

23.title: CPU per min
23.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_process_cpu_seconds), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

24.title: Heap size

25.title: Total allocated bytes
25.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_process_runtime_total_alloc_bytes), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

26.title: System memory
26.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_process_runtime_total_sys_memory_bytes), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

27.title: Memory allocated to process
27.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_process_memory_rss), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

29.title: Cpu usage in millicores

30.title: Memory usage

31.title: Log records ratio (out/in)
31.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_log_records), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd ration=(sent[]/2)/total[] // 2 exporters: otlphttp/dt & debug
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent,ration

32.title: Metric point ratio (out/in)
32.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_metric_points), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd ration=(sent[]/2)/total[] // 2 exporters: otlphttp/dt & debug
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

33.title: Trace records ratio (out/in)
33.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd ration=(sent[]/2)/total[] // 2 exporters: otlphttp/dt & debug
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

36.title: K8s ip lookup miss
36.query:
timeseries ipmiss=sum(otelcol_otelsvc_k8s_ip_lookup_miss), default: 0, by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd ipmiss_pers=ipmiss[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove ipmiss

37.title: Type of collector deployment

38.title: Number  of collectors
38.query:
timeseries avg(otelcol_process_uptime), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector,service_instance_id}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| summarize Collectors = count()

leftYAxisSettings.label: Active Gate - Event Ingest - Event Incoming Count

41.title: Number of metric points ingested
41.query:
timeseries sum(dt.sfm.server.metrics.ingest.external_datapoints), by: { source, dt.ingest.channel }
| filter source == "opentelemetry"

49.title: Signals droped by Memory_limiter
49.query:
timeseries total_log=sum(otelcol_processor_refused_log_records),total_metrics=sum(otelcol_processor_refused_metric_points),total_span=sum(otelcol_processor_refused_spans), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd totalpers_log=total_log[]/todouble(interval/1m),totalpers_metric=total_metrics[]/todouble(interval/1m),totalpers_span=total_span[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total_log,total_metrics,total_span

50.query:
fetch logs 
| filter k8s.container.name == "otc-container"
| filter telemetry.sdk.name == "opentelemetry"
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(app.label.name,$collector)
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 500
| parse content, "DATA JSON:jsonContent"
| filterOut isNull(jsonContent)
| fieldsRemove content
| fieldsAdd loglevel = upper(jsonContent[`level`])
| fieldsFlatten jsonContent
| filter `jsonContent.msg` == "Partial success response"
| parse `jsonContent.message`, "DATA 'OTLP' LD ':' DATA:message"
| limit 50
| fields message

52.title: Number of records dropped by OTLP ingest API
52.query:
fetch logs 
| filter k8s.container.name == "otc-container"
| filter telemetry.sdk.name == "opentelemetry"
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(app.label.name,$collector)
| parse content, "DATA JSON:jsonContent"
| filterOut isNull(jsonContent)
| fieldsRemove content
| fieldsAdd loglevel = upper(jsonContent[`level`])
| fieldsFlatten jsonContent
| filter `jsonContent.msg` == "Partial success response"
| makeTimeseries drops = sum(`jsonContent.dropped_data_points`), by: {`jsonContent.data_type`}

55.title: Process uptime

56.query:
fetch logs
| filter k8s.namespace.name == "dynatrace" and k8s.container.name == "otc-container"
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(app.label.name,$collector)
| parse content, "DATA JSON:jsonContent"
| filterOut isNull(jsonContent)
| fieldsRemove content
| fieldsAdd loglevel = upper(jsonContent[`level`])
| fieldsFlatten jsonContent, fields: {msg, kind, data_type, name, message}
| filterOut in(loglevel,{"INFO","NONE"})
| limit 50
| fields timestamp, msg, kind, data_type, name, message, cluster = k8s.cluster.name, collector = app.label.name

57.title: Exporter Queue Saturation
57.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_exporter_queue_size),capacity=avg(otelcol_exporter_queue_capacity), by: {k8s.cluster.name,dynatrace.otel.collector}
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(dynatrace.otel.collector,$collector)
| fieldsAdd ratio=(total[]/capacity[])*100
| fieldsAdd ratiopermin=ratio[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total,capacity,ratio

59.query:
fetch logs
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter event.domain == "k8s" and k8s.resource.name == "events"
| filter matchesPhrase(object.involvedobject.name,"dynatrace") OR matchesPhrase(object.involvedobject.name,"contrib")
| filter object.metadata.namespace == "dynatrace"
//| filter in(object.involvedobject.name,$collector)
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 50
| fields timestamp, object = object.involvedobject.name, object.reason, object.message

60.title: Total Dropped Records
60.query:
fetch logs 
| filter k8s.container.name == "otc-container"
| filter telemetry.sdk.name == "opentelemetry"
| filter in(k8s.cluster.name,$cluster)
| filter in(app.label.name,$collector)
| parse content, "DATA JSON:jsonContent"
| filterOut isNull(jsonContent)
| fieldsRemove content
| fieldsAdd loglevel = upper(jsonContent[`level`])
| fieldsFlatten jsonContent
| filter `jsonContent.msg` == "Partial success response"
| summarize drops = sum(`jsonContent.dropped_data_points`)
